Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: இகலிற்கு எதிர்சாய்தல் ஆக்கம் அதனை மிகலூக்கின் ஊக்குமாம் கேடு.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: 'Tis gain to turn the soul from enmity; Ruin reigns where this hath mastery.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A split composition showing two choices. On the left, a person is confronted by a dark cloud of hostility. They choose to yield and step away from it ('எதிர்சாய்தல்'). As they do, a path of prosperity and wealth opens up before them ('ஆக்கம்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: On the right, the same person is confronted by the same cloud of hostility. This time, they choose to feed it and make it stronger, engaging with it eagerly ('மிகலூக்கின்').
Layered_Composition.Background: As they feed the hostility, it grows into a monstrous storm of destruction that consumes them and everything around them ('ஊக்குமாம் கேடு').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: Yielding to hostility brings prosperity. Encouraging hostility brings destruction.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The two paths and their starkly different outcomes are the core of the image. The cloud of hostility that either dissipates or grows into a destructive storm based on the person's choice is the key visual.
Art_Direction.Mood_and_Emotion: A clear choice, consequential, contrasting prosperity and ruin.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The left 'yielding' path is bright and golden. The right 'engaging' path becomes dark, stormy, and full of destructive energy.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A balanced, diptych-style shot that clearly shows the two choices and their inevitable consequences.

Cultural_Anchors: Yielding to hostility brings prosperity ('எதிர்சாய்தல் ஆக்கம்')
